phrases: It is Ryu's brother that I like.
I am going to spend some money on him this year.
I wonder if she gave it to him.
We will be back again for New Year's.
tell Chi to say hi properly next time.
I do not have a face to show.
My brother said to say hi properly next time.
Are you trying to be nice to me?
Y-You thought it would be bad to tell me about Tohru, did not you?
I am glad it is finally come to this.
Now you can finally give up on my brother.
What is baseball got to do with anything?
I cannot do anything, can I?
Chizu-chan does so much for me.
Maybe if I were like Kazehaya-kun, I might have been able to cheer her up.
I wonder if Chizu went to see Ryu's brother after what happened.
I wonder if she congratulated him.
She should just snap for once.
And I sort of said something to make it worse.
There is more fish in the sea.
Chizu froze up for a second.
It is not like it bothers me when I am hurting her deliberately, though.
I wonder; what were we doing?
I never knew that was bothering you.
Did you know who she liked too?
We used to hang out at Ryu's a lot when Tohru was back.
She was worried about Chizu-chan, but she could not do anything.
Honestly, I cannot even tell whether she is playing tough or if she is so shocked that she is in denial.
And she is supposed to be easy to read.
I do not know what she is feeling.
But I know she is not okay.
This is why I hate guys.
No, because she has you two.
There is nothing we can say to her.
Yeah, but I do not think that is a problem.
I would be glad to have friends who worry for me.
Do you need to force yourself to say something to her?
I am sure you are doing the right thing.
She might not be able to say anything right now either.
Did not Joe just get rejected?
I was wondering how Kazehaya-kun would help her.
I cannot really say anything to her,
but even so I hope there is something I can do.
I just got comforted by a loser.
Now I cannot really tease him as much.
She has Kuronuma, Yano and Ryu.
Oh, Sawako and Yano-chin are not here yet.
I am glad it is finally come to this.
We did not meet up the other day.
Sorry, I even kicked you guys out.
It is fine, we see each other every day anyway.
Let us get to our seats.
Pin will be here any minute.
I should not cry; Chizu-chan's not crying.
Let us hear her out if she talks to us.
And let her vent as much as she wants.
And I am going to act normal around Chizu-chan until then.
Maybe that is the best I can do for her.
Nah, I will be back right away.
Has Ryu talked to Chizu at all today?
Half and half, an Elizabeth with cheese and mayo,
a bagel, a melon bun, nuts and a dried fruit bun, please!
Sorry, you would not even look at me.
All that stuff yesterday, and now my bread.
I do not care to apologize for what happened yesterday.
That I was hopelessly in love with Tohru?
That I should hurry up and give up?
I did not fall in love with Tohru just for the sake of getting rejected.
I did not really go to see Tohru yesterday.
I would have wanted to see him properly if I could.
So I went to give you the present after he would already have left.
Do not talk to me for a while.
How could I eat all this?
I did not fall in love with Tohru just for the sake of getting rejected.
At least let me say thanks.
I had a bit of a fight with Ryu yesterday night...
I am sorry, I am really sorry.
I did not even want to see him.
I am glad it came to this.”
What do you mean it is hopeless?
You are too blunt, you idiot.
Did you even feel sorry for me?
But I hate myself the most for blaming him.
I wanted to be happier when I gave it to him.
I do not even understand marriage, and here I am taking it out on people.
Yeah, come on, let it out.
When else are you going to vent?
You have every right to take it out on him.
I would not even have given him the present if I were you.
I went to his house, and he goes, forget about him.”
Why did I give him that bread?
I could not find any words to help Chizu-chan.
But on the way home, she said...
I felt a bit better after you made me cry.
All right, let us go eat cake.
Seriously, I get fat when I hang out with you.
I have a ton of bread.
